sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="A_Nav">36bf22d22f01e41006472aa62799b6e1</child><cloned>2020-12-15 08:57:40</cloned><last_validated>2020-12-15 08:57:40</last_validated><parent display_value="Customer Service Search Navigation">aebfbd78b31d3200e408c75f26a8dcc4</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function() {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>csm-search-navigation-links</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Customer Service Search Navigation</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[data.t = $sp.getParameter('t');
data.q = encodeURIComponent($sp.getParameter('q'));
data.enableCommunitySearch = false;
data.enableKbSearch = false;

var csm_portals = {"5b49418bdb4aa200b1f6f78eaf96195f" : "", "2086b814c3221200f3897bfaa2d3aea8" : "", "89275a53cb13020000f8d856634c9c51" : "", "45d6680fdb52220099f93691f0b8f5ad" : ""};

if(!csm_portals.hasOwnProperty($sp.getPortalRecord().getUniqueValue())) {
	data.showWidget = false;
} else {
	if (GlidePluginManager().isActive('com.sn_communities')) {
		data.enableCommunitySearch = true;
	}

	if (GlidePluginManager().isActive('com.snc.knowledge_serviceportal')) {
		data.enableKbSearch = true;
	}

	data.showWidget = data.enableCommunitySearch || data.enableKbSearch;
}

]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-02 02:38:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>aebfbd78b31d3200e408c75f26a8dcc4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Customer Service Search Navigation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Portal" source="com.glide.service-portal.customer-service-base">0b2f9a252fac201006472aa62799b62a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_aebfbd78b31d3200e408c75f26a8dcc4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-02 02:39:20</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="panel panel-default" ng-show="data.showWidget">
  <div class="panel-heading">
    <h4 role="header" class="panel-title">${Search Within}</h4>
  </div>
  <div class="list-group">
    <div ng-show="data.enableCommunitySearch" class="list-group-item">
      <a ng-href="?id=community_search&q={{data.q}}">Community</a>
    </div>
    <div ng-show="data.enableKbSearch"  class="list-group-item">
      <a ng-href="/kb?id=kb_search&keyword={{data.q}}">Knowledge</a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-15 08:57:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>f2bf22d22f01e41006472aa62799b6e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>36bf22d22f01e41006472aa62799b6e1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="XQ" source="x_549089_xq">4d863f582fcd601006472aa62799b6d7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="XQ">4d863f582fcd601006472aa62799b6d7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_f2bf22d22f01e41006472aa62799b6e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-15 08:57:40</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
